evidence.claim: MIM Software adheres to HIPAA regulations for data privacy.
MIM Software utilizes HL7 standards for healthcare information exchange.
MIM Software engages in secure electronic data interchange (EDI) practices.
MIM Software utilizes cloud infrastructure to support its applications, ensuring scalable and secure delivery of healthcare software.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of X12 or EDI use cases found on their site.
